snippet: Now that the Affordable Care Act is proving to be even more successful than expected, it’s time for Democrats to stand up for it.
abstract: Editorial urges Democratic congressional candidates to capitalize on success of Affordable Care Act, which has signed eight million people on, and to use it to remind voters what government can accomplish.
lead_paragraph: Now that the Affordable Care Act is proving to be even more successful than expected, it’s time for Democrats to stand up for it.

headline.main: How to Run on Health Reform
headline.print_headline: How to Run on Health Reform

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
